reviewText: I had to buy a region free player glad I did been wanting this movie to complete my three mothers trilogy collection even though you cant get rid of the French subtitles I don't care as long it plays and it talks in English I have waited to buy this on blue ray so beggers can't be choosie right good print ..not to mention I am a huge fan of Dario Argento its all I can expect ...now my collection of the three mothers is complete.
Excellent perfect! Got exactly what was described. Great seller.....
